about_the_game:
The fine line of madness

Awaken outside your Shelter, where you have lived all your life, and discover an ancient network of tunnels that connected several Shelters. Abandoned and empty, the network of tunnels has been filled with bizarre, carnivorous creatures amidst a lot of garbage and rust.

At first, everything seems like a dream. In the middle, it all seems like a nightmare. In the end, everything seems so real... Be careful not to go mad, but the voices in the tunnels echo the inevitability of dementia.

Key Features:

  • Survive: Beware the creatures of the underground junkyard, they are very dangerous and carnivorous. If your life meter reaches zero, start all over again...

  • Items: Collect items from around the map. Manage them and create more items through your inventory.

  • Weapons: Find firearms and melee weapons scattered around the map. There are four different firearms.

  • Battles: Get ready to defeat frantic and bizarre bosses in crazy battles. Each boss has its own unique look and abilities.

  • Choices: With each new save, the spawns of items and enemies change. Here, the choices are yours: choose your start, choose your order of battle and choose your end... But don't worry, because nothing will alter your character's reality.

  • Story: Although you choose how this story is told, the reality of Joseph, the main character, is only one and it's up to you to discover the truth.

  • Crazy: The more things you see, the “madder” your character becomes. And the higher your Madness Bar measures, the more things you can see.
